alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 12:55AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Yuma County through 145 AM MST... At 1254 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kinter, or near Fortuna Foothills, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fortuna Foothills, Blaisdell, Ligurta and Kinter. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 13 and 23. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 33 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
